summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Massachusetts Street, in the City of Seattle, from Railroad Avenue South to Centennial Place, all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same, to a width of sixty (60) feet, with five inch planking, in accordance with Resolution No. 288 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," under the provisions of Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899.
